comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The Duke and John Traill were polo players: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johnny_Traill en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hernando_Fitz-James_Stuart,_14th_Du... Lady Wimborne's husband, Ivor Churchill Guest, the Lord Lieutenant of Ireland, was avid about polo too; she was the former Alice Grosvenor (d. 1948). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivor_Guest,_1st_Viscount_Wimborne Mrs. Traill was named Henrietta Roberts; she is described as "Irish-Argentine" here: www.irlandeses.org/0803macloughlin2.htm
